item.title: SQL
item.description: SQL Intro DB is any collection of related info Computer is great for storing databases DBMS is the software to create, maintain, and secure a database. SQL is a language DBMS allow you to perform the CRUD operations and other administrative tasks Two types of DB, Relational and Non-Relational Relational DB use SQL and store data in tables with rows and columes Non-Relational data store data using other data structures
